That Which Watches was a death knight sentry that guarded the entrance to the Murder Tribunal deep in the Undercellar of Baldurs Gates Lower City in the late 15 century DR.
That Which Watches wore a set of intricately decorated plate mail, blackguards gauntlets, plate boots, and a horsetail helmet. The creatures armor was lines with gold. It carried a longsword.
That Which Guards shared abilities and vulnerabilities of other undead creatures. It could lang smiting strikes of great power that could leave the targets staggered.
In the , That Which Watches was placed to stand guard of the entrance to the Murder Tribunal alongside That Which Lurks and That Which Guards. The creature spoke in rhymes with an archaic turn of phrase.
